<a id="class_ClassDB"></a>

# ClassDB

**Inherits:** [Object](class_object.md)

A class information repository.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Provides access to metadata stored for every available engine class.

\ **Note:** Script-defined classes with ``class_name`` are not part of **ClassDB**, so they will not return reflection data such as a method or property list. However, [GDExtension](class_gdextension.md)-defined classes *are* part of **ClassDB**, so they will return reflection data.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="class_ClassDB_method_can_instantiate"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **can_instantiate**\ (\ class\: [StringName](class_stringname.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_ClassDB_method_can_instantiate)

Returns ``true`` if objects can be instantiated from the specified `class`, otherwise returns ``false``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_ClassDB_method_class_call_static"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Variant](class_variant.md) **class_call_static**\ (\ class\: [StringName](class_stringname.md), method\: [StringName](class_stringname.md), ...\ ) <span class="vararg">vararg</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_ClassDB_method_class_call_static)

Calls a static method on a class.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_ClassDB_method_class_exists"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **class_exists**\ (\ class\: [StringName](class_stringname.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_ClassDB_method_class_exists)

Returns whether the specified `class` is available or not.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_ClassDB_method_class_get_api_type"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[APIType](class_classdb.md#enum_ClassDB_APIType) **class_get_api_type**\ (\ class\: [StringName](class_stringname.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_ClassDB_method_class_get_api_type)

Returns the API type of the specified `class`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_ClassDB_method_class_get_enum_constants"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[PackedStringArray](class_packedstringarray.md) **class_get_enum_constants**\ (\ class\: [StringName](class_stringname.md), enum\: [StringName](class_stringname.md), no_inheritance\: [bool](class_bool.md) = false\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_ClassDB_method_class_get_enum_constants)

Returns an array with all the keys in `enum` of `class` or its ancestry.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_ClassDB_method_class_get_enum_list"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[PackedStringArray](class_packedstringarray.md) **class_get_enum_list**\ (\ class\: [StringName](class_stringname.md), no_inheritance\: [bool](class_bool.md) = false\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_ClassDB_method_class_get_enum_list)

Returns an array with all the enums of `class` or its ancestry.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_ClassDB_method_class_get_integer_constant"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](class_int.md) **class_get_integer_constant**\ (\ class\: [StringName](class_stringname.md), name\: [StringName](class_stringname.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_ClassDB_method_class_get_integer_constant)

Returns the value of the integer constant `name` of `class` or its ancestry. Always returns 0 when the constant could not be found.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_ClassDB_method_class_get_integer_constant_enum"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[StringName](class_stringname.md) **class_get_integer_constant_enum**\ (\ class\: [StringName](class_stringname.md), name\: [StringName](class_stringname.md), no_inheritance\: [bool](class_bool.md) = false\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_ClassDB_method_class_get_integer_constant_enum)

Returns which enum the integer constant `name` of `class` or its ancestry belongs to.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_ClassDB_method_class_get_integer_constant_list"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[PackedStringArray](class_packedstringarray.md) **class_get_integer_constant_list**\ (\ class\: [StringName](class_stringname.md), no_inheritance\: [bool](class_bool.md) = false\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_ClassDB_method_class_get_integer_constant_list)

Returns an array with the names all the integer constants of `class` or its ancestry.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_ClassDB_method_class_get_method_argument_count"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](class_int.md) **class_get_method_argument_count**\ (\ class\: [StringName](class_stringname.md), method\: [StringName](class_stringname.md), no_inheritance\: [bool](class_bool.md) = false\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_ClassDB_method_class_get_method_argument_count)

Returns the number of arguments of the method `method` of `class` or its ancestry if `no_inheritance` is ``false``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_ClassDB_method_class_get_method_list"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Array](class_array.md)\[[Dictionary](class_dictionary.md)\] **class_get_method_list**\ (\ class\: [StringName](class_stringname.md), no_inheritance\: [bool](class_bool.md) = false\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_ClassDB_method_class_get_method_list)

Returns an array with all the methods of `class` or its ancestry if `no_inheritance` is ``false``. Every element of the array is a [Dictionary](class_dictionary.md) with the following keys: ``args``, ``default_args``, ``flags``, ``id``, ``name``, ``return: (class_name, hint, hint_string, name, type, usage)``.

\ **Note:** In exported release builds the debug info is not available, so the returned dictionaries will contain only method names.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_ClassDB_method_class_get_property"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Variant](class_variant.md) **class_get_property**\ (\ object\: [Object](class_object.md), property\: [StringName](class_stringname.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_ClassDB_method_class_get_property)

Returns the value of `property` of `object` or its ancestry.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_ClassDB_method_class_get_property_default_value"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Variant](class_variant.md) **class_get_property_default_value**\ (\ class\: [StringName](class_stringname.md), property\: [StringName](class_stringname.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_ClassDB_method_class_get_property_default_value)

Returns the default value of `property` of `class` or its ancestor classes.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_ClassDB_method_class_get_property_getter"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[StringName](class_stringname.md) **class_get_property_getter**\ (\ class\: [StringName](class_stringname.md), property\: [StringName](class_stringname.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_ClassDB_method_class_get_property_getter)

Returns the getter method name of `property` of `class`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_ClassDB_method_class_get_property_list"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Array](class_array.md)\[[Dictionary](class_dictionary.md)\] **class_get_property_list**\ (\ class\: [StringName](class_stringname.md), no_inheritance\: [bool](class_bool.md) = false\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_ClassDB_method_class_get_property_list)

Returns an array with all the properties of `class` or its ancestry if `no_inheritance` is ``false``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_ClassDB_method_class_get_property_setter"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[StringName](class_stringname.md) **class_get_property_setter**\ (\ class\: [StringName](class_stringname.md), property\: [StringName](class_stringname.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_ClassDB_method_class_get_property_setter)

Returns the setter method name of `property` of `class`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_ClassDB_method_class_get_signal"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Dictionary](class_dictionary.md) **class_get_signal**\ (\ class\: [StringName](class_stringname.md), signal\: [StringName](class_stringname.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_ClassDB_method_class_get_signal)

Returns the `signal` data of `class` or its ancestry. The returned value is a [Dictionary](class_dictionary.md) with the following keys: ``args``, ``default_args``, ``flags``, ``id``, ``name``, ``return: (class_name, hint, hint_string, name, type, usage)``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_ClassDB_method_class_get_signal_list"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Array](class_array.md)\[[Dictionary](class_dictionary.md)\] **class_get_signal_list**\ (\ class\: [StringName](class_stringname.md), no_inheritance\: [bool](class_bool.md) = false\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_ClassDB_method_class_get_signal_list)

Returns an array with all the signals of `class` or its ancestry if `no_inheritance` is ``false``. Every element of the array is a [Dictionary](class_dictionary.md) as described in [class_get_signal()](class_classdb.md#class_ClassDB_method_class_get_signal).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_ClassDB_method_class_has_enum"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **class_has_enum**\ (\ class\: [StringName](class_stringname.md), name\: [StringName](class_stringname.md), no_inheritance\: [bool](class_bool.md) = false\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_ClassDB_method_class_has_enum)

Returns whether `class` or its ancestry has an enum called `name` or not.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_ClassDB_method_class_has_integer_constant"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **class_has_integer_constant**\ (\ class\: [StringName](class_stringname.md), name\: [StringName](class_stringname.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_ClassDB_method_class_has_integer_constant)

Returns whether `class` or its ancestry has an integer constant called `name` or not.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_ClassDB_method_class_has_method"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **class_has_method**\ (\ class\: [StringName](class_stringname.md), method\: [StringName](class_stringname.md), no_inheritance\: [bool](class_bool.md) = false\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_ClassDB_method_class_has_method)

Returns whether `class` (or its ancestry if `no_inheritance` is ``false``) has a method called `method` or not.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_ClassDB_method_class_has_signal"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **class_has_signal**\ (\ class\: [StringName](class_stringname.md), signal\: [StringName](class_stringname.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_ClassDB_method_class_has_signal)

Returns whether `class` or its ancestry has a signal called `signal` or not.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_ClassDB_method_class_override_api_type"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Error](class_@globalscope.md#enum_@GlobalScope_Error) **class_override_api_type**\ (\ class\: [StringName](class_stringname.md), api\: [APIType](class_classdb.md#enum_ClassDB_APIType)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_ClassDB_method_class_override_api_type)

Overrides the API type of `class` to `api`. See [APIType](class_classdb.md#enum_ClassDB_APIType).

\ **Note:** This should only be used with a thorough understanding of its implications.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_ClassDB_method_class_set_property"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Error](class_@globalscope.md#enum_@GlobalScope_Error) **class_set_property**\ (\ object\: [Object](class_object.md), property\: [StringName](class_stringname.md), value\: [Variant](class_variant.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_ClassDB_method_class_set_property)

Sets `property` value of `object` to `value`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_ClassDB_method_get_class_list"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[PackedStringArray](class_packedstringarray.md) **get_class_list**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_ClassDB_method_get_class_list)

Returns the names of all engine classes available.

\ **Note:** Script-defined classes with ``class_name`` are not included in this list. Use [ProjectSettings.get_global_class_list()](class_projectsettings.md#class_ProjectSettings_method_get_global_class_list) to get a list of script-defined classes instead.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_ClassDB_method_get_current_api"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[APIType](class_classdb.md#enum_ClassDB_APIType) **get_current_api**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_ClassDB_method_get_current_api)

Returns the currently active API type. See [APIType](class_classdb.md#enum_ClassDB_APIType).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_ClassDB_method_get_inheriters_from_class"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[PackedStringArray](class_packedstringarray.md) **get_inheriters_from_class**\ (\ class\: [StringName](class_stringname.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_ClassDB_method_get_inheriters_from_class)

Returns the names of all engine classes that directly or indirectly inherit from `class`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_ClassDB_method_get_parent_class"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[StringName](class_stringname.md) **get_parent_class**\ (\ class\: [StringName](class_stringname.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_ClassDB_method_get_parent_class)

Returns the parent class of `class`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_ClassDB_method_instantiate"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Variant](class_variant.md) **instantiate**\ (\ class\: [StringName](class_stringname.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_ClassDB_method_instantiate)

Creates an instance of `class`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_ClassDB_method_is_class_enabled"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **is_class_enabled**\ (\ class\: [StringName](class_stringname.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_ClassDB_method_is_class_enabled)

Returns whether this `class` is enabled or not.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_ClassDB_method_is_class_enum_bitfield"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **is_class_enum_bitfield**\ (\ class\: [StringName](class_stringname.md), enum\: [StringName](class_stringname.md), no_inheritance\: [bool](class_bool.md) = false\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_ClassDB_method_is_class_enum_bitfield)

Returns whether `class` (or its ancestor classes if `no_inheritance` is ``false``) has an enum called `enum` that is a bitfield.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_ClassDB_method_is_parent_class"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **is_parent_class**\ (\ class\: [StringName](class_stringname.md), inherits\: [StringName](class_stringname.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_ClassDB_method_is_parent_class)

Returns whether `inherits` is an ancestor of `class` or not.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_ClassDB_method_set_current_api"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_current_api**\ (\ api\: [APIType](class_classdb.md#enum_ClassDB_APIType)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_ClassDB_method_set_current_api)

Sets the globally active API type to `api`. See [APIType](class_classdb.md#enum_ClassDB_APIType).

\ **Note:** This should only be used with a thorough understanding of its implications.
